steps.title: Welcome to the Trainer Experience
steps.description: As a Trainer, you have comprehensive access to all system features to demonstrate and teach other users. Let's explore the powerful training tools available to you.
benefits: Access all system training modules and resources
Demonstrate any role to prospective users
Manage guided tours and training content
steps.voiceScript: Welcome to your comprehensive Trainer experience! You have access to powerful tools that let you demonstrate the system to new users and manage all training content.

steps.title: Training Modules Overview
steps.description: The Training Modules tab shows interactive learning content for different user roles. Each module provides step-by-step tutorials and best practices.
benefits: Browse comprehensive training curricula
Access role-specific learning paths
Track user progress and completion rates
steps.voiceScript: The Training Modules section contains structured learning content organized by role and difficulty level, helping you guide users through comprehensive system training.

steps.title: Role Demonstrations Center
steps.description: This is where you can switch to any role in the system to demonstrate features and capabilities to prospective users. Perfect for live demonstrations.
benefits: Switch between any system role instantly
Demonstrate role-specific features live
Show users exactly what they'll experience
steps.voiceScript: The Role Demonstrations center is your most powerful tool - you can instantly switch to any role like Director, Production Scheduler, or Plant Manager to show users exactly what their experience will be like.

steps.title: Role Switching Demonstration
steps.description: Let's highlight the role switching area where you can select any role to demonstrate. Each role card shows what features and pages they'll access.
benefits: Instant role switching without logout
See role-specific navigation and permissions
Perfect for sales demonstrations and training
steps.voiceScript: Here you can click any role card to instantly switch and demonstrate that role's specific features, navigation, and capabilities - perfect for showing prospects exactly what their experience will be.

target.description: Highlight the role switching cards area

steps.title: Tour Management System
steps.description: The Tour Management tab is where you create, edit, and manage all guided tours. You can generate AI-powered tours and customize the experience for each role.
benefits: Create and customize guided tours
Use AI to generate tour content automatically
Manage voice narrations and tour flow
steps.voiceScript: Tour Management is where the magic happens - you can create detailed guided tours with AI assistance, manage voice narrations, and ensure every user gets a perfect introduction to their role.

steps.title: AI-Powered Tour Creation
steps.description: Within Tour Management, you'll find powerful AI tools that can automatically generate comprehensive tours for any role, complete with step-by-step guidance and voice narration.
benefits: Generate tours automatically with AI
Customize tour content for specific needs
Pre-generate voice narrations for smooth delivery
steps.voiceScript: The AI tour generation tools can create comprehensive guided tours automatically, saving you hours of work while ensuring every role gets perfectly tailored guidance through their specific features.

target.description: Highlight the tour creation and management tools

preActions.description: Ensure Tour Management tab is active

steps.title: Training Resources Library
steps.description: The Training Resources tab contains documentation, video tutorials, best practices guides, and other materials to support comprehensive user training.
benefits: Access comprehensive documentation
Share best practices and guides
Provide additional learning resources
steps.voiceScript: The Training Resources library provides all the supplementary materials you need - documentation, video tutorials, and best practices guides to support comprehensive user education.

steps.title: Your Training Superpowers
steps.description: As a Trainer, you have the unique ability to demonstrate the full system to anyone, create engaging learning experiences, and ensure every user gets the perfect introduction to their role.
benefits: Demonstrate any role instantly
Create and manage all training content
Provide world-class user onboarding experiences
steps.voiceScript: You now have the knowledge to leverage your full Trainer capabilities - demonstrate any role, create engaging tours, and provide world-class user onboarding experiences that will wow your prospects and users.

target.description: Stay on training page for summary
